title: 3 and Out - SEC Total Draft Dominance; 5th Year Options Define Draft Classes; Cam Stranded; Foles Coming For Trubisky; Post-Draft Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - SEC Total Draft Dominance; 5th Year Options Define Draft Classes; Cam Stranded; Foles Coming For Trubisky; Post-Draft Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff puts the SEC's total dominance in the Draft into perspective, why it will only continue to separate, and why declining or exercising the 5th-year option is ultimate judge of a team's draft class. He also looks at Cam Newton's future is more uncertain ever as teams fill QB slots, and why it's only a matter of time before Nick Foles starts over Mitchell Trubisky, and answers questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
